00134 } else {
00135     ob_start();
00136     // create datagrid
00137     $reportgrid = new report_datagrid();
00138     $reportgrid->setSQLColumn('b.biblio_id', 'b.title AS \''.__('Title').'\'', 'COUNT(item_id) AS '.__('Copies').'',
00139         'b.isbn_issn AS \''.__('ISBN/ISSN').'\'',
00140         'b.call_number AS \''.__('Call Number').'\'');
00141     $reportgrid->setSQLorder('b.title ASC');
00142     $reportgrid->invisible_fields = array(0);
00143 
00144     // is there any search
00145     $criteria = 'bsub.biblio_id IS NOT NULL ';
00146     $outer_criteria = 'b.biblio_id > 0 ';
00147     if (isset($_GET['title']) AND !empty($_GET['title'])) {
00148         $keyword = $dbs->escape_string(trim($_GET['title']));
00149         $words = explode(' ', $keyword);
00150         if (count($words) > 1) {
00151             $concat_sql = ' AND (';
00152             foreach ($words as $word) {
00153                 $concat_sql .= " (bsub.title LIKE '%$word%' OR bsub.isbn_issn LIKE '%$word%') AND";
00154             }
00155             // remove the last AND
00156             $concat_sql = substr_replace($concat_sql, '', -3);
00157             $concat_sql .= ') ';
00158             $criteria .= $concat_sql;
00159         } else {
00160             $criteria .= ' AND (bsub.title LIKE \'%'.$keyword.'%\' OR bsub.isbn_issn LIKE \'%'.$keyword.'%\')';
00161         }
00162     }
00163     if (isset($_GET['author']) AND !empty($_GET['author'])) {
00164         $author = $dbs->escape_string($_GET['author']);
00165         $criteria .= ' AND ma.author_name LIKE \'%'.$author.'%\'';
00166     }
00167     if (isset($_GET['class']) AND !empty($_GET['class'])) {
00168         $class = $dbs->escape_string($_GET['class']);
00169         $criteria .= ' AND bsub.classification LIKE \''.$class.'%\'';
00170     }
00171     if (isset($_GET['gmd']) AND !empty($_GET['gmd'])) {
00172         $gmd_IDs = '';
00173         foreach ($_GET['gmd'] as $id) {
00174             $id = (integer)$id;
00175             if ($id) {
00176                 $gmd_IDs .= "$id,";
00177             }
00178         }
00179         $gmd_IDs = substr_replace($gmd_IDs, '', -1);
00180         if ($gmd_IDs) {
00181             $outer_criteria .= " AND b.gmd_id IN($gmd_IDs)";
00182         }
00183     }
00184     if (isset($_GET['language']) AND !empty($_GET['language'])) {
00185         $language = $dbs->escape_string(trim($_GET['language']));
00186         $criteria .= ' AND bsub.language_id=\''.$language.'\'';
00187     }
00188     if (isset($_GET['location']) AND !empty($_GET['location'])) {
00189         $location = $dbs->escape_string(trim($_GET['location']));
00190         $outer_criteria .= 'i.location_id=\''.$location.'\'';
00191     }
00192     if (isset($_GET['recsEachPage'])) {
00193         $recsEachPage = (integer)$_GET['recsEachPage'];
00194         $num_recs_show = ($recsEachPage >= 20 && $recsEachPage <= 200)?$recsEachPage:$num_recs_show;
00195     }
00196 
00197     // subquery/view string
00198     $subquery_str = '(SELECT DISTINCT bsub.biblio_id, bsub.gmd_id, bsub.title, bsub.isbn_issn, bsub.call_number, bsub.classification, bsub.language_id
00199         FROM biblio AS bsub
00200         LEFT JOIN biblio_author AS ba ON bsub.biblio_id = ba.biblio_id
00201         LEFT JOIN mst_author AS ma ON ba.author_id = ma.author_id
00202         LEFT JOIN biblio_topic AS bt ON bsub.biblio_id = bt.biblio_id
00203         LEFT JOIN mst_topic AS mt ON bt.topic_id = mt.topic_id WHERE '.$criteria.')';
00204 
00205     // table spec
00206     $table_spec = $subquery_str.' AS b
00207         LEFT JOIN item AS i ON b.biblio_id=i.biblio_id';
00208 
00209     // set group by
00210     $reportgrid->sql_group_by = 'b.biblio_id';
00211     $reportgrid->setSQLCriteria($outer_criteria);
00212 
00213     // callback function to show title and authors
00214     function showTitleAuthors($obj_db, $array_data)
00215     {
00216         // author name query
00217         $_biblio_q = $obj_db->query('SELECT b.title, a.author_name FROM biblio AS b
00218             LEFT JOIN biblio_author AS ba ON b.biblio_id=ba.biblio_id
00219             LEFT JOIN mst_author AS a ON ba.author_id=a.author_id
00220             WHERE b.biblio_id='.$array_data[0]);
00221         $_authors = '';
00222         while ($_biblio_d = $_biblio_q->fetch_row()) {
00223             $_title = $_biblio_d[0];
00224             $_authors .= $_biblio_d[1].' - ';
00225         }
00226         $_authors = substr_replace($_authors, '', -3);
00227         $_output = $_title.'<br /><i>'.$_authors.'</i>'."\n";
00228         return $_output;
00229     }
00230     // modify column value
00231     $reportgrid->modifyColumnContent(1, 'callback{showTitleAuthors}');
00232 
00233     // put the result into variables
00234     echo $reportgrid->createDataGrid($dbs, $table_spec, $num_recs_show);
00235 
00236     echo '<script type="text/javascript">'."\n";
00237     echo 'parent.$(\'pagingBox\').update(\''.str_replace(array("\n", "\r", "\t"), '', $reportgrid->paging_set).'\');'."\n";
00238     echo '</script>';
00239 
00240     $content = ob_get_clean();
00241     // include the page template
00242     require SENAYAN_BASE_DIR.'/admin/'.$sysconf['admin_template']['dir'].'/printed_page_tpl.php';
00243 }
